lines: WARNING - THIS EPISODE CONTAINS SUBJECT MATTER OF A SEXUAL NATURE.
You know that ${loverName} enjoys the outdoors and would like to spend some time camping. He offers to take you camping on an overnight trip.
#OFFER TO GO ALONG BUT ON A DAY TRIP ONLY
#SAY THAT YOU WILL GO ON AN OVERNIGHT TRIP
It doesn't look like the two of you have interests that are well suited to one another. This relationship probably will not succeed.

${loverName} seems a bit disappointed but agrees to go for the day. The weather is splendid, the air crisp and fresh. There is a lake that looks just perfect for rowing. ${loverName} suggests that you and he take a rowboat out.
As you are floating around on the lake, ${loverName} produces a bottle of expensive champagne. He offers you a drink. Will you accept?
The champagne makes you both a little giddy. ${loverName} puts his arm around your waist and gives you a soft kiss. You can:
#TELL HIM TO KEEP ROWING AND 'DON'T ROCK THE BOAT'
Looks like he was getting a bit frisky there. Besides, if he got too tired, you could be floating around out there for weeks.
You're feeling very spry today. The rowboat isn't very comfortable, but the two of you have a wonderful time anyway. The day passes with much laughter.
You can see this sea captain's intentions a mile away. You suggest that he concentrate on navigating the lake.
${loverName} is beginning to think that you are boring. The day ends early, and you don't hear from him for a while.

You must be feeling very adventurous. When you arrive at the campgrounds, everything is soaking wet. By evening the air becomes drier, and the sky clears. You stroll arm-in-arm on a beautiful moonlit night. When it is time
to turn in, ${loverName} asks if you would like to share a sleeping bag with him. You can:

The two of you settle in for a cozy night of fireside romance. Unfortunately, because of the excitement of the day, when you turn to gaze lovingly into ${loverName}'s eyes, you find him fast asleep! Good night.
The evening was romantic, but you would like it to end here. Tomorrow is another day.
